summary: This is an automated out-of-office email reply from Johanna Rae Hudgens, an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA), indicating she is on vacation until August 12, 2019. It references a July 5, 2019 SDNY Grand Jury subpoena and suggests contacting other AUSAs on the case for urgent matters.

persons.name: Johanna Rae Hudgens
persons.context: The sender of the automatic out-of-office reply email, identified as an AUSA who is on vacation. The email is related to a grand jury subpoena.

events.title: SDNY Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A grand jury subpoena was issued by the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

events.title: AUSA Out of Office
events.description: Assistant United States Attorney Johanna Rae Hudgens sends an automatic reply stating she is on vacation until August 12, 2019.

keyFacts: The email is an automatic out-of-office reply from AUSA Johanna Rae Hudgens dated August 3, 2019.
The email references a Southern District of New York (SDNY) Grand Jury subpoena dated July 5, 2019.
The email indicates ongoing legal proceedings (a grand jury investigation) related to the Epstein case in the SDNY as of mid-2019.
